review: Very satisfied and affordable. Clearly explaining the issue and not lots of medicines are recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Before we start to mention success story and high accolades for Dr. Kanimozhi - AK Fertility + Apollo Cradles (and her well-established, well-wishing team like para-medic staff, scan experts, Pharma-distributors etc.,) in our Gynaec treatment journey,

I like to talk of our experience of overcoming a crisis in our 1st pregnancy - where my wife went thru' a miscarriage in her 6th month during the testing times in Covid 2.0 lock-down. While the most-painful moment of our life 'baby-expelling' happened, later my wife had to fight for her own life with a heavy/non-stop bleed - during when Dr. Kanimozhi stayed (strong) with her and accompanied her throughout that 1 hour at night,  pro-actively prepared us for all that was required to stabilise her (like blood collection in stock, para-medics). As we were sleepless on that dreadful night, Dr too seems to have continuously been checking with the clinic for continued nursing care through out that night. That's the moment we felt like an extended family with Dr and team - when someone cared us so deep in that distressed hour - taking us through our 'recovering moments' after a storm. 

When people around us, at that moment, cursed the Dr and hospitals/procedures as lapses - we knew in our hearts about what struggles that the Dr and team had to go thru along with us in such situations, - we did keep everyone in our prayers for their good deed and saving us thru' the crisis and unprecedented miscarriage event for all. 

NOW the good part of transformation ! 

We pursued treatment after 1yr break and here now my wife is pregnant in her 20th week - this time we are blessed 'doubly'.

We thank God and God-sent Dr Kanimozhi and her team for recreating this beautiful moment. We have always admired at her sharp memories and caringly  remembering important dates and medical reports that reflected as personal care beyond any Dr normal duties and paved way to this turn-around !! 

It's more reassuring for us now and a reminder that "life goes on, whatever happens - just to believe, and move on spreading love, care and affection all over. Count your blessings everyday" ...  


Bowing with respect, love and loads of gratitude to you Dr Kanimozhi + AK Fertlity and Apollo Cradles team - Hearty wishes and prayers for your continued dedicated service, care and successfully 'treating' the needy ones and your noble journey to transform people's lives ....  and May your family and dear ones be blessed !! 

Heart-felt regards and love,
Vijayakanth and Nithya (& Baby Mirudhula)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor is so kind and friendly. She explains everything in very detail and with calmness while asking doubts. I recommend to my colleagues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was 1st time we thought to consult a gynaecologist as we were planning for pregnancy. 
It was the time we found this best charming doctor Kanimozhi. She is someone whom we can relate to like a mentor just in the 1st visit. She gave best advices and gave good pre pregnancy counselling with everything clearly explained and from then on every visits, scans and medical advices, up to now has been extremely satisfying and purposeful. We feel very much happy and relieved in each checkup as she boosts us with lots of positivity and gave us too much of hope that I would get pregnant naturally. With all her support, I was conceived after two months of regular medication under her. The happiest moment in our life happened only because we met her. Dr. Kanimozhi always wear a warm smile with excellent confident and pleasant attitude which would wipe away all your doubts and health anxieties away. The most important thing that I liked on overall lookup is she is not at all money based . Being in a budgeted family control, these medical checkups would rather bring us tension and anxiety with more expenses. But to our luck, we found this doctor Who is actually Genuine enough and asks us to take limited scan or do tests only if required rather than pulling us down at every stretch. Thank you so much ma'am for fulfilling our life to the fullest with my baby. Will definitely share my delivery experience too once my baby is in to this world. I would hardly recommend my Dr. Kanimozhi to anyone who is planning for your pregnancy and pregnancy related care. Definitely you won't regret after visiting her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I’ve visited doctor Kanimozhi ma’am with endometriotic cyst and polyp. She explained the treatment in a simple manner without making us fear. She suggested for a surgery. Once the surgery is done I conceived naturally immediately after the surgery. She was really a miracle woman who cured everything. It was a blessing being her patient. Please do visit ma’am if you have any pregnancy issues. I strongly and wholeheartedly suggest her. Thank you ma’am .

Well experienced doctor 
Frendly doctor clearing all douts and 
collecting reasonable fees
Waiting time also very less 
Star rating 4.5/5

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi All,

If you are looking for the best and professional Doctors in city for infertility treatment, I would undoubtedly suggest Dr. K Kanimozhi. We've consulted in many hospitals in city without any improvement on our infertility treatment. When we got a chance to meet her for the First time, we have been given positive hopes which gained more confidence on her. She is very friendly in nature. We especially loved how Dr. K Kanimozhi really took her time to explain our condition post thorough examination as well as our treatment option. She worked with us to address our health concerns First rather than telling us what to do. We underwent her best treatment option and successfully having a baby now. She has stood for all of our needs and made herself available during our vist and treatment with her. We are all the time grateful for her consultations and for offering her best professional practices to us throughout this successful journey. 

We had a great visit and the Doctor's demeanor has really put us easy so we highly recommend her and clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Kanimozhi mam is a blessing for our family because of her treatment, we are blessed our baby after 5 long years of wait before meeting mam. Even in the first visit she gave us so much confidence. *** ***** ********** *********** ******** ** ***** Also she never delays treatment. I got conceived during pandemic time and I had complications as well. Doctor handled me with utmost care. She will be available in whatsApp too and cleared our doubts that helped us during pandemic time. I had cervical incompetence and was on complete bed rest. Due to medicines ,  cervical cerclage and doctor's positive words, I was  able to carry my baby till 37 weeks. Doctor always respects our decision. Even for last minute change of hospital of delivery,she agreed. She always insisted me to go for normal delivery ,as I was not able to bear pain I asked for c section for which also she supported. She remembers all her patients history. The clinic is always neat and clean with trained and friendly staff. ****** *** ** ***** ********* *** explains every thing clearly . She listens to our problems patiently . I strongly  recommend  Dr Kanimozhi mam if anyone want happy and safe pregnancy and delivery

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thank you so much Dr. Kanimozhi for bringing our sweet Baby into the world safe and healthy. It is because of your concern and expertise that I had an unremarkable pregnancy and carried to full term. We are truly blessed by these tiny and amazing little miracles.I'm really thankful to Dr. Kanimozhi for taking bold decision in my case, to carry and push until 37th week for a healthy baby, even when I got into pre-term. I'm sure no other Doctor would have taken this much care and commitment towards their patients. Bravo Madam! During this tough times of Covid-19 pandemic, she supported us a lot and also reachable on her mobile round the clock. One of the most gratifying things about  Dr. Kanimozhi is she will take up the entire responsibility from starting until baby is delivered safe. We cannot thank you enough for the excellent care you have provided.  From the moment we met you, we were certain God had led us to you. Thank you so much for the difference you make in the lives of your patients! Your kindness, sincere caring, and concern make everything better and are a great encouragement.Undoubtedly I recommend Dr. Kanimozhi for all my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hi This is Thangalakshmi,  I was suffering from infertility with pcod for the past 10yrs..without baby crossing 10yrs is not much easy....luckily we came to know about Dr.Kanimozhi...who is friendly to all patients...she will give only positive hopes when we are totally down.After many struggles I took only 6month to cure my pcod problem..Finally we are blessed with a boy baby with the help of Kanimozhi mam. I strongly recommend Dr.Kanimozhi for those who is trying for pregnancy...Without madam my life will be incomplete...According to me, she Is my next god who changed my life..Thank u so much mam. We will never forget u till our life ends...( waiting time to meet doctor is less, value for everything)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was my first pregnancy and we have approached Kanimozhi mam after finding lots of good reviews in Practo.

Based on our experience:
Kanimozhi mam has been very patient friendly and always approachable for any clarifications. She always boosts my energy with positive vibes on every visit which kept me strong during my pregnancy days. Her explanations about each and every treatment procedures are crystal clear and never put us in any fear . With all her guidance , we had a safe maternity and wholeheartedly thankful to Kanimozhi mam forever.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Myself and my husband visited Doctor Kanimozhi mam last year for irregular periods. But after getting proper advice and correct procedure from doctor I followed all as per she instructed. I liked this doctor approach because she asked me to engage in all activities, maintain and reduce my weight to regularise my periods. I have seen many used to give unwanted pills. but she did not prescribe any such. i also reduced and the cycle became regular. By the way i got conceived naturally. now again i am approaching her because she is so friendly and always explaining in detail the do's and dont's clearly. waiting time to see doctor is minimal. I gain confidence in me whenever i meet Dr. Kanimozhi mam. Thanks.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Married for 7 years, and getting pregnant wasn't as easy as we had thought. We saw Dr. Kanimozhi  and felt immediately comfortable with her.  We had three failed IUI's and decided to move forward with ICSI. She kept realistic but positive at the same time, which made me feel very comfortable along the way, and gave me confidence in the ICSI process.The ICSI cycle went perfectly which led to a healthy full-term pregnancy .We also be thankful her for helping me through a quite dark and depressing time when I was feeling like I would never become a mother.She has done everything in her power to make sure that I would get the best outcome from my treatment. She was always reachable and supportive when we need. Finally we are having  our precious little one 😊.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is very friendly and caring. She gave me best support and she conveyed issues normally rather making us panic . I recommend her the best . You are the perfect example to be a doctor with positive, friendly and encouraging attitude. That gave me strength entire my pregnancy period and felt everything is normal every time i visit the clinic. Thank you for attending our phone calls every time and for the treatment. Finally, big thanks for delivery and the encouragement you have shown. This is all needed to be moms from a doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Kanimozhi made our dream come true of adding a baby to our family. After years of trying on our own and going through treatments, we had got recommended to Dr.Kanimozhi by a known person. She had always kept us informed during the entire treatment process and was easily accessible when required. She is extremely welcoming, kind and professional. She was so careful in assessing and did not miss any details that may compromise the outcome. She always takes her time to explain everything despite how busy the practise may get. She genuinely cares for her patients and knows what’s best for you and your situation, trust in the process. I highly recommend Dr.Kanimozhi to my known circles.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Obstetrics / Antenatal Care,
review:
Visited Dr. Kanimozhi Mam as I had difficulty in conceiving. She immediately addressed the underlying issue and commenced treatment. With her support, care and guidance, I was able to conceive in short span of time. Though I had cervical incompetence, I was able to carry my baby till 37 weeks, thanks to her early diagnosis and corrective course of action. She is very cost effective. She explains all the issues in detail and accepts our feedback, before deciding further. She is patient friendly. She is always available on Whatsapp in case of any doubts. Thanks to her, my wish of becoming a mother is fulfilled. THANKS TO YOU MAM!!

She is highly recommended and undoubtedly one of the best!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We had an extremely pleasant experience with Dr. Kanimozhi. She made us feel at home during all our visits. She was helpful with all details regarding the pregnancy. She was a true pillar of strength during my pregnancy term especially with the pandemic! She gave us all the help and guidance needed during labour too. We couldn’t have our family with us since it was the pandemic. But she ensured that we don’t face a single difficulty with the entire process! 

I recommend Dr. Kanimozhi for a smooth and happy pregnancy!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I'm very lucky and blessed to be Dr.Kanimozhi mam's patient.At first i had a complication in my uterus  which was cured during 6thweek of pregnancy and also was a great support for my work life balance. Each time I visit, she was my only hope to cross through by giving me all positive vibes with a bright smile throughout my pregnancy journey.She is my biggest support during my labour and happily delivered a healthy baby boy at my 38th week. All respect to her professional and personal care for me. **** *******

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Hello everyone this is Ritesh
Me and my wife Neha were so much worried as she was unable to conceive
We then visited Dr.Kanimozhi (Apollo Cradle - Nungambakkam) a year back. She was very much positive and patiently listened to our problem..We then undergone infertility treatment and we are happy to share that we are going to be parents sooner. We would like thank doctor from the bottom of our heart as she got the most precious gift in our life. 
She patiently handled the whole treatment and we followed each and every suggestion of her
To be frank, we never visited other doctor after we consulted her.
We recommed this doctor undoubtedly

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are very thankful to Kanimozhi mam for treating me for pregnancy... We consulted 2 doctors before for treating irregular periods but was not satisfied.. One of my friend referred Kanimozhi mam and we were very hopeful and confident after meeting her.. she listens to all our queries and treats in a friendly manner.. I got pregnant in third month of consulting her and blessed wit boy baby.. she was very much helpful through out my pregnancy and answered my calls even in mid night.. she guides in proper way and I get extra confident and hope after meeting her each time.. she boosts positivity and hope to all her patients... I surely suggest my friends to Kanimozhi mam ..I and my husband are very very glad that we consulted her and blessed with most precious gift of our life..Thank you so much mam..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Am super happy with the Doctor!

We have visited Dr. Kanimozhi for pregnancy. Prior to her, we visited two doctors, but we were not treated well and unsatisfied. Finally, we met Dr. Kanimozhi and we are very satisfied during the first consultation itself. The way doctor explained the issue with us, treatments to undergo, patience to hear our problems and open with caring approach. She is very down to the earth, clarified our doubts at anytime politely. Doctor has very rich experience in the Infertility treatment. Now, my wife is pregnant and we were very very happy. All the credits goes to Doctor. I strongly recommend **** *** ** *** **** *** ******* ****** *** *********** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I am writing this review on behalf of my wife. We have been having frequent checkups with Dr. Kanimozhi and have had a pleasant and relaxing experience. She provided really nice support throughout the entire checkup. I recommend AK fertility for pregnancy and Cooper T removal

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We visited Dr.k.Kanimozhi for irregular periods and fertility treatment on august, the very next month we got conceived through ovulation induction. Her positive and open speech gave us new ray of hope. We continued our treatment throughout our pregnancy and she was so supportive during this pandemic situation. I suddenly had pregnancy induced hypertension by 7th month, mam handled it with care till our delivery, she responded us for all our doubts with special care on time. And now we are blessed with a bunch of happiness. I really thank Dr.kanimozhi for bringing so much happiness in our family. She clearly explains the treatment which she is going to proceed for us, so that we can stay confident.Even she doesnot give unnecessary tablets. Getting such a wonderful doctor is a pure bliss, she never forgets each patients history, everytime I wonder when she says am this am weeks old without seeing my scan reports or files. I really thank you once again mam for bring little princesses in our life.
reply_text: Thank you very much the feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Thank u soo much for ur concern and friendliness speech. I had thyroid and infertility problem. First time I saw her she gave positive approach to my life. She started IVF treatment many changes in my body. I got 6 month treatment for pregnancy. In IVF treatment i will be get a twin babies. I am very glad to announce now i am nine month pregnant. In pregnancy she gave IVF treatment for 5 months . When she finished treatment for me afterwards also she reply me when I asked any doubts she gave response to me. Dr. Kanimozhi madam like a god to me otherwise no words to say. In her treatment she treated me like sister. I am very lucky because I had a great doctor. She is very caring. My whole life i don't forget you doctor. Thank you for your concern and friendliness speech mam. Sorry for the late review mam. Thank u so much mam.

review: Dr Kanimozhi is very friendly and supportive. She used to provide detailed explanation and answer all our queries and makes us feel very comfortable. I had normal vaginal delivery which would not have been possible without her support. I would highly recommend Dr. Kanimozhi for those who plan for their maternity. Nice jovial doctor and she will make you feel safe and relaxed throughout the entire maternity cycle.

review: Went for Copper T removal. Doctor asked to come back at a later date post period. For this I paid ₹500 as consulting fees.
reply_text: When you visit the clinic for a consultation , u r supposed to pay the fee. I advised the right way to do the procedure . Any advice or suggestions given has to be paid  . If u require a free advice I request you to visit the nearby PHC .
